$interpreted: Morris: Say...
Morris: This is not the first time I'm out here collecting stuff for research either...
Morris: Why do you still have to tag along!
Charle: Headmaster's orders. After all, we're going to a place that's quite dangerous. Moving in groups will make this trip much safer.
Morris: You said it's dangerous, yet you still brought your student along? Was that the headmaster's order as well?
Charle: The reason I brought Gotthold with me is the same reason you brought Clovis with you.
Morris: Hmph, is your student even comparable to mine?
Charle: Hoho. Gotthold has plenty of potential in my eyes.
Morris: Whatever you say...
Gotthold: Yikes...it's cold.
Gotthold: However, these Atlas Ruins are certainly impressive~
Gotthold: Aosta, we don't often get to go on missions together. Looking forward to working with you~
Aosta: I'm here because professor Dietrich brought me along to gain some experience. You too?
Gotthold: Haha, professor Ceres just asked me to come, so I guess it's the same?
Aosta: Whatever, as long as you don't hold us back.
Gotthold: ......
Morris: I brought Clovis along because he is the most talented student in the Academy.
Morris: I simply can't see your reasoning being the same as mine.
Gotthold: ......
Charle: Gotthold, ignore him. I know you're quite capable too. That's why I brought you along to learn, or do you not believe me as well?
Gotthold: ...No, professor Ceres.
Morris: We'll talk about those things later. Time to assign the missions.
Charle: First, we'll collect the items headmaster requested. Then we'll each take our own student to find the materials we need.
Morris: Students, memorize the map well. You will be in charge of the safety area.
Morris: Clovis, once you two are finished with your mission, we'll go to the area near the church to collect Crystals.
Charle: The area near the church has high-level monsters wandering nearby. Remember to keep your student well-protected.
Morris: Yeah, yeah, got it. You're so annoying. As long as I can handle it, everything will be a-okay~
Charle: ...*sigh*...all in all, we'll go our separate ways for now. The rendezvous point will be right here.
Charle: Gotthold, you should follow Clovis as well. We'll meet up here later.
Gotthold: O-Okay, professor Ceres.
Charle: Be careful~
Gotthold: ......
Morris: You goddamn fool! Do you have any idea what you've done?
Charle: What happened?
Morris: Your idiot student instigated Clovis to retrieve the Crystals from the church. Didn't we tell you that the place is crawling with high-level monsters!
Charle: Gotthold, what Dietrich is saying, is it true?
Gotthold: ...He's a genius after all, isn't he?
Gotthold: Aosta also said himself that he wants to prove his abilities to professor Dietrich. So it's not exactly all my fault either, right?
Charle: Gotthold, I am so disappointed in you!
Gotthold: Professor Ceres...I...
Charle: We need to go find Clovis now! Gotthold, you're coming with us!
Gotthold: ......
Morris: Clovis!
Gotthold: Professor, they're here too!
Charle: Gotthold, you cover the rear. Dietrich, we'll do this together!
Morris: Got it!
Gotthold: All of you, come with me! I will not let you disturb Professor!
Gotthold: ...*huff*...*puff*...Finally took care of them all...
Gotthold: .........
Morris: This area should be safe for now.
Morris: Clovis, are you alright!
Aosta: Just twisted my ankle, nothing serious.
Morris: Who said you can do such things on your own!
Aosta: Didn't you always want this material?
Morris: You moron! What's more important, some material or your damn life!?
Morris: ...*sigh*...whatever. Forget it~
Morris: Hehe, with this, my experiment will...
Charle: Gotthold, what are you thinking?
Charle: Gotthold?
Gotthold: N-Nothing, professor.
Charle: Gotthold, your Rune skills have become even more refined.
Gotthold: .........
Charle: Gotthold... You don't look so well?
Gotthold: Professor...I'm not...
Charle: Gotthold!
Morris: Don't touch him!
Morris: Looks like he was bitten by monsters during the battle. Our only shot is to try and stop the infection before it spreads!
Charle: Gotthold, professor Dietrich is the Academy's medical expert. Therefore, you will be alright. Hang in there!
Morris: Damn, the infection is spreading too fast.
Morris: Quick! Back to the Academy! If we have the equipment, perhaps there's still a chance!
Gotthold: Just leave me alone! I know that once you're bitten by a monster, there's only one way it can go...
Charle: That's not true. As long as we can return to the Academy, you'll be fine.
Gotthold: So what? I'm just a student with no talent anyway. All of you have long despised me!
Charle: No, that's not...
Morris: Get back!
Morris: I'll be damned, the infection is already messing with his mind.
Gotthold: Professor, I'm so sorry. It's my fault for messing up the mission...
Charle: It's okay. Don't think about that.
Gotthold: But I caused you so much trouble...
Charle: It's okay. Now get going. We've got to get back...
Charle: Go...Gotthold...?

Model.Text: Say...
This is not the first time I'm out here collecting stuff for research either...
Why do you still have to tag along!
Headmaster's orders. After all, we're going to a place that's quite dangerous. Moving in groups will make this trip much safer.
You said it's dangerous, yet you still brought your student along? Was that the headmaster's order as well?
The reason I brought Gotthold with me is the same reason you brought Clovis with you.
Hmph, is your student even comparable to mine?
Hoho. Gotthold has plenty of potential in my eyes.
Whatever you say...
Yikes...it's cold.
However, these Atlas Ruins are certainly impressive~
Aosta, we don't often get to go on missions together. Looking forward to working with you~
I'm here because professor Dietrich brought me along to gain some experience. You too?
Haha, professor Ceres just asked me to come, so I guess it's the same?
Whatever, as long as you don't hold us back.
I brought Clovis along because he is the most talented student in the Academy.
I simply can't see your reasoning being the same as mine.
Gotthold, ignore him. I know you're quite capable too. That's why I brought you along to learn, or do you not believe me as well?
...No, professor Ceres.
We'll talk about those things later. Time to assign the missions.
First, we'll collect the items headmaster requested. Then we'll each take our own student to find the materials we need.
Students, memorize the map well. You will be in charge of the safety area.
Clovis, once you two are finished with your mission, we'll go to the area near the church to collect Crystals.
The area near the church has high-level monsters wandering nearby. Remember to keep your student well-protected.
Yeah, yeah, got it. You're so annoying. As long as I can handle it, everything will be a-okay~
...*sigh*...all in all, we'll go our separate ways for now. The rendezvous point will be right here.
Gotthold, you should follow Clovis as well. We'll meet up here later.
O-Okay, professor Ceres.
Be careful~
You goddamn fool! Do you have any idea what you've done?
What happened?
Your idiot student instigated Clovis to retrieve the Crystals from the church. Didn't we tell you that the place is crawling with high-level monsters!
Gotthold, what Dietrich is saying, is it true?
...He's a genius after all, isn't he?
Aosta also said himself that he wants to prove his abilities to professor Dietrich. So it's not exactly all my fault either, right?
Gotthold, I am so disappointed in you!
Professor Ceres...I...
We need to go find Clovis now! Gotthold, you're coming with us!
Clovis!
Professor, they're here too!
Gotthold, you cover the rear. Dietrich, we'll do this together!
Got it!
All of you, come with me! I will not let you disturb Professor!
...*huff*...*puff*...Finally took care of them all...
This area should be safe for now.
Clovis, are you alright!
Just twisted my ankle, nothing serious.
Who said you can do such things on your own!
Didn't you always want this material?
You moron! What's more important, some material or your damn life!?
...*sigh*...whatever. Forget it~
Hehe, with this, my experiment will...
Gotthold, what are you thinking?
Gotthold?
N-Nothing, professor.
Gotthold, your Rune skills have become even more refined.
Gotthold... You don't look so well?
Professor...I'm not...
Gotthold!
Don't touch him!
Looks like he was bitten by monsters during the battle. Our only shot is to try and stop the infection before it spreads!
Gotthold, professor Dietrich is the Academy's medical expert. Therefore, you will be alright. Hang in there!
Damn, the infection is spreading too fast.
Quick! Back to the Academy! If we have the equipment, perhaps there's still a chance!
Just leave me alone! I know that once you're bitten by a monster, there's only one way it can go...
That's not true. As long as we can return to the Academy, you'll be fine.
So what? I'm just a student with no talent anyway. All of you have long despised me!
No, that's not...
Get back!
I'll be damned, the infection is already messing with his mind.
Professor, I'm so sorry. It's my fault for messing up the mission...
It's okay. Don't think about that.
But I caused you so much trouble...
It's okay. Now get going. We've got to get back...
Go...Gotthold...?
